item.title: Yesterday, the US Ethereum Spot ETF saw a net inflow of $461 million
item.description: On August 9th, as monitored by Farside Investors, the net inflow of US Ethereum spot ETF yesterday was $461 million. This includes:BlackRock ETHA: +$2.547 billionFidelity FETH: +$1.323 billionBitwise ETHW: +$7.8 millionSamsung QETH: +$1.2 millionGrayscale ETHE: +$26.8 millionGrayscale Ethereum Trust: +$38.2 million

item.title: Yesterday, the net inflow into the U.S. Bitcoin Spot ETF was $4.039 billion
item.description: On August 9th, as monitored by Farside Investors, the net inflow into the US Bitcoin spot ETF yesterday was $403.9 million. This includes:BlackRock IBIT: +$360 millionFidelity FBTC: +$30.5 millionGrayscale Bitcoin Mini ETF: +$13.4 million.

item.title: HackQuest has raised $4.1 million in funding, with lead investors Animoca Brands and Open Campus.
item.description: On August 9th, as monitored by businessinsider, HackQuest has successfully completed a financing round worth $4.1 million. This financing round was led by Animoca Brands and Open Campus. Gate Ventures, HashKey Capital, Hash Global, Find Satoshi Labs (StepN), Outlier Ventures, Bytetrade Labs, and other investors also participated. The funds from this round will be utilized to expand its developer platform. This platform addresses the talent gap in Web3 by providing education, on-chain credentials, and ecosystem support. Currently, it has attracted 90,000 developers from more than 30 countries.

item.title: A whale address sold 38,500 ETH in a panic a week ago and has now made a small buy of 1,800 ETH today.
item.description: On August 9th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, about a week ago, Whale 0x3c9E sold off 38,582 ETH (valued at $1.3689 billion) in a panic during the drop in the ETH price at a price of $3,548.Today, with the rebound of the ETH price, the same address purchased 1,800 ETH (worth $7.22 million) at a high price of $4,010.

item.title: In the past 24 hours, the total netizens' margin call liquidations across all exchanges amounted to $228 million, with $95.32 million in ETH liquidations.
item.description: On August 9th, based on Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total amount of liquidation across the entire network was $228 million. A total of 86,742 people were liquidated globally. The long liquidations totaled $79.64 million, and the short liquidations totaled $148 million. ETH liquidations reached $95.32 million, making it the most liquidated asset across the network.

item.title: Binance Alpha will list Xeleb Protocol (XCX) on August 11th
item.description: On August 9, according to official information, Binance Alpha will be the first to list Xeleb Protocol (XCX) on August 11.Users who are eligible can use Binance Alpha points to claim the airdrop on the Alpha event page. The airdrop will be available for claiming once trading begins. More details will be announced shortly.

item.title: 《Stablecoin Regulation》 Takes Effect, Some Hong Kong Money Changers Still Exchange USDT Without License
item.description: August 9th. According to Caixin, the Hong Kong "Stablecoin Regulation" came into effect on August 1, 2025. In addition to establishing an issuer licensing system, the regulation clearly states that without being a "permitted offeror" holding one of the five types of licenses, one is not allowed to conduct stablecoin "offerings" in Hong Kong. In other words, exchanges that previously operated USDT and USDC stablecoin exchange businesses in Hong Kong will need to suspend such operations.Reporters discovered that some exchanges, represented by "One Bitcoin" and "5X Crypto", have suspended the exchange of USDT, USDC, and fiat currency. Some exchanges like "BitsMark" have even ceased operations. However, exchanges such as "Crypto Panda" and "Star Coin" still facilitate private inquiry transactions while no longer displaying prices for exchanging stablecoins to users.

item.title: Meme Coin Market Watch: Base Chain MIGHTFLY, XTTA, and YETI New Coins Active
item.description: On August 9th, according to GMGN data, in the "Hot" category, the top five tokens in terms of trading volume on the Solana blockchain within the past 24 hours are TRUMP, BOSS, MOONTRUMP, LILPEPE, and GOOGLE. With the exception of TRUMP, all are newly listed meme tokens that have a low market capitalization and a small number of holders, presenting a relatively high risk.On the other hand, on the Base blockchain, the top five tokens in terms of trading volume within the past 24 hours are AERO, ZORA, MIGHTFLY, XTTA, and YETI. Both MIGHTFLY and YETI have been listed for less than 24 hours and have a low market capitalization, posing a relatively high risk. Therefore, please participate with caution.BlockBeats reminds users that most meme coins have no practical use cases and experience significant price volatility. Investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: DWP Management has announced that its fund has raised approximately $200 million since April, all in XRP.
item.description: On August 9th, Digital Wealth Partners Management, LLC (DWP Management) made an announcement today. It stated that since April, its series of private investment funds have successfully raised approximately $200 million in funding. As a private fund manager that accepts investments in digital assets, all in-kind contributions up to now have been made in XRP.

item.title: IoTeX Partners with HashKey Exchange to Co-build Digital Asset Infrastructure and AI Ecosystem
item.description: On August 9th, as per official information, the DePIN + AI open smart platform IoTeX announced a strategic partnership today with the licensed compliant exchange platform HashKey Exchange. The two parties will jointly probe and establish digital asset infrastructure and, based on this, commence the co-construction process of the "AI Eco Center".This cooperation encompasses multiple key domains, such as the construction of a digital asset service system, the identity verification (ioID) and trusted data access capabilities provided by the IoTeX Layer1 blockchain platform, as well as HashKey's comprehensive support in regulatory compliance consulting, asset custody, and auditing. Currently, HashKey Exchange has officially launched the "IOTX/HKD" trading pair as its fifth Hong Kong dollar asset trading pair, which is also the first asset trading pair concentrating on the AI field and holds significant market importance.This strategic partnership indicates IoTeX's continuous deepening
